participant_1.background:
I make sure my family is well-provided for, even though I'm not very tall.
i m an only child.
my favorite band is the beastie boys.
i am enrolled in several college credit courses.
I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to.
i work as a trauma surgeon.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
i own a chevy tahoe.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there!
How's it going?
Good! Just got back from a run.
Awesome! I love running!
Me too! It's so relaxing.
I know right? It clears my head.
Me too! I love going on long runs in the woods.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could live in the woods.
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
That sounds like a dream! I'm an only child and I love being alone, so I think I would love that.
Me too! I'm a trauma surgeon, so I'm used to being around people all day, so I need my time to myself to relax and unwind.
I can imagine! That must be a lot of pressure.
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is!
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could travel more.
Me too! I love seeing new places and meeting new people.
I'm sure you've seen some amazing things.
I have! I've been all over the world.
That's awesome!
Thanks
